content:
A case team is a group of people working together to solve cases. It can include support agents, managers, and product managers.

Available in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions.

To add members, choose predefined roles that determine access levels. Contacts can be added but only have read-only access when enabled as customer portal users.

Admins can predefine case teams for quick additions and create assignment rules or email alerts.

Filter case lists by choosing My Case Teams. Report on team memberships by running a case report and selecting My team's cases from the View filter.
title: Understanding Case Teams in Service Cloud
